description:
At peak times in real life, Dublin airport handles a departure or arrival every 40 seconds. This doesn't happen easily. Pilots must be fully ready for departure at the holding point, and when cleared to line up and depart, do so with no delay. All whilst looking down the endless stream of strobes on approach. Arrivals will have to be thrown into the sequence too - making the runway operations at Dublin intense, challenging, and great fun for everyone. Each pilot will be entered into a draw for a chance to win Dublin's best scenery - Aerosoft's Mega Airport Dublin. Keep Saturday the 9th of April free for this event, fly from/to your favourite airport into or out of Dublin, and enjoy the full staffing of ATC from VATéir.

Find charts here: http://iaip.iaa.ie/iaip/aip_eidw_charts.htm
Essential info for pilots, pages 15-17: http://iaip.iaa.ie/iaip/Published%20Files/AIP%20Files/AD/EI_AD_2_EIDW_EN.pdf
subtitle: Dublin turns up the pressure
title: Dublin High Intensity Runway Ops

description:
VATeir is pleased to invite you to visit Dublin Airport (EIDW) on Friday 26th September from 1800Z. We will be staffing Dublin from top to bottom, which is a perfect opportunity to take advantage of the beauty of Ireland and visit our capital with a full ATC service for your flight! Join us on Friday as we light Dublin up on VATSIM!

 

For more information visit us online, like us on Facebook or follow us on twitter!
subtitle: Dublin Online
title: Dublin Online!

description:
VATEIR and the Dutch VACC are excited to announce the latest city pair between Dublin (EIDW) and Rotterdam The Hague Airport (EHRD). This event takes place on Sunday the 20th April between 17:30 and 20:30 UTC and will give pilots the chance to experience some great ATC in some of Western Europe's most important cities.

Flights between the 2 cities take slightly over an hour giving you the chance to fly both legs. The airports will be fully staffed on the night. Routes can be found in VATROUTE. Scenery for Rotterdam can be found here, scenery for Dublin here. We look forward to seeing you!
subtitle: Shuttle between EHRD and EIDW with full ATC coverage!
title: Rotterdam-Dublin city pair

description:
There will be a S2 practical exam on DUBLIN TOWER (EIDW_TWR) on Wednesday 8th October from 1800Z. We need as much traffic as possible to fly into and out of Dublin to really test the candidate!

SCENERY & CHARTS
Full charts for the Shannon are available here: http://www.iaa.ie/safe_reg/iaip/aip_eidw_charts.htm

Paywere Scenery is available from: http://www.eiresim.com
subtitle: S2 Exam on Dublin Tower
title: S2 CPT on EIDW_TWR

description:
Our next edition of our Iceland featured shuttle event will be the 23rd August from 15-21z. This time Vatsim-Scandinavia have invited VATEIR and Dublin to participate along with one of our own airfields Helsinki-Vantaa. So you can expect great ATC coverage along your way to Iceland from one of our featured airports, make sure you attend at this scenic and exciting event.

All flights to/from Iceland are being subject to oceanic clearances/procedures, therefore we would highly recommend that you are familiar with oceanic procedures.

Take time and read the helpful documentation which is available [b][url=http://vatsim-scandinavia.org/?page_id=1590]here[/url][/b] and [b][url=http://www.andersmoen.com/iceland.php]here[/url][/b].

We will for sure see some old pilots visiting Keflavik and Iceland again but don't worry if it's your first time visiting Iceland, you will enjoy this beatiful and dramatic landscapes!
subtitle: Feat. EIDW and EFHK
title: Iceland Oceanic Shuttle Event

description:
If you flew from Dublin to London last year in the 'real world', you were on the world’s second busiest international air route – up there with flights from business hubs in the Far East such as Hong Kong and Jakarta.The one hour 10 minute flight from the Irish capital to London was taken by 3.5 million passengers in 2013! 

To celebrate this on VATSIM, VATeir & VATSIM UK have decided to pair up & overload the virtual airways! We welcome you to fly between DUBLIN (EIDW) and LONDON HEATHROW (EGLL) in any direction with full ATC cover onFriday 14th November from 1900Z-2200Z.

We look forward to seeing you in the virtual skies flying across the Irish Sea! For more information visit us online, like us on Facebook or follow us on twitter!
subtitle: EIDW/EGLL
title: Dublin/Heathrow Overload

description:
The controllers of the Irish vACC welcome you to fly for the Dublin Overload 2014 (EIDW). You can expect a full service between 1700z and 2200z on Saturday 27th December and is a great excuse to escape from the family after Christmas and do some flying! We have scheduled five hours of ATC services to allow you to fly 'there and back' on one of the many short haul destinations from Dublin, or relax on your Long Haul inbound flight safe in the knowledge that you are definately going to arrive in time.

There are no slots. Just fly in and out at your leisure.

Payware scenery is available from Aerosoft and Eiresim. Freeware scenery is available in the AVSIM library.

We look forward to seeing you at Dublin!
subtitle: Fly in and out of a fully staffed Dublin
title: Dublin Overload

description:
Dear Pilots,

VATEIR and VAT France propose a CityLink between Paris - CDG and Dublin Int, to take place Tuesday 23rd June from 1800z to 2100z. 

Route:

LFPG-EIDW: ATREX UT225 VESAN UL613 SANDY UL15 BIG UL9 GAVGO UL18 DIKAS UL9 STU UM17 VATRY

EIDW-LFPG: PESIT L149 BAKUR UN546 STU UL9 GAVGO UL18 SFD UM605 HARDY/N0400F250 UM605 BIBAX

Charts:

France: Pilot Briefing

Ireland: Ireland IAIP

We hope to see you there !
subtitle: 3 Hours of ATC services
title: Dublin <> Paris CDG CityLink

description:
VATEIR and the Dutch VACC are excited to announce the latest city pair between Dublin (EIDW) and Amsterdam Airport Schiphol (EHAM). This event takes place on Saturday the 25th July between 17:30 and 20:30 UTC and will give pilots the chance to experience some great ATC in some of Western Europe's most important airports.

Flights between the 2 cities take slightly over an hour giving you the chance to fly both legs. The airports will be fully staffed. Routes can be found in VATROUTE. We look forward to seeing you!
subtitle: Fly between these cities with full ATC staffing
title: Amsterdam - Dublin City Pair

description:
30th August from 17:00 to 20:00z Vatsim-Scandinavia and Vateir would like to welcome everyone for an evening with fully staffed airports in Oslo (ENGM) and Dublin (EIDW). This is a great opportunity to discover the Emerald Isle and Norway in your favorite aircraft and experience our finest controllers which will accomodate your departure and arrival into any of the airfields.

Routes:

EIDW - ENGM: ROTEV UP600 TRN UM89 ALOTI T400 ZOL Z16 RIPAM

ENGM - EIDW: TOR P609 NIVUN UM82 RIVOT UM89 TRN DCT BLACA DCT NIMAT

We hope that you will be visiting Ireland and Norway for some good Sunday flying!

Velkomen! | Fáilte!
subtitle: 30th August 17:00-20:00z
title: Dublin-Oslo Shuttle

description:
VATeir, VATSIM UK and the Dutch VACC will be staffing up Dublin (EIDW), Manchester (EGCC) and Amsterdam Schiphol (EHAM) on the 29th of May between 1630 and 2030z.

This event allows you to fly from one airport to another (in any combination) whilst experiencing full ATC coverage! Below is a list of the 17 flight options available.

Dublin (EIDW) - Manchester (EGCC) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Dublin (EIDW) - Amsterdam (EHAM) - Dublin (EIDW)
Dublin (EIDW) - Amsterdam (EHAM) - Manchester (EGCC)
Manchester (EGCC) - Dublin (EIDW) - Manchester (EGCC)
Manchester (EGCC) - Dublin (EIDW) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Manchester (EGCC) - Amsterdam (EHAM) - Dublin (EIDW)
Manchester (EGCC) - Amsterdam (EHAM) - Manchester (EGCC)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Dublin (EIDW) - Manchester (EGCC)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Dublin (EIDW) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Manchester (EGCC) - Dublin (EIDW)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Manchester (EGCC) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Dublin (EIDW) - Manchester (EGCC)
Dublin (EIDW) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Manchester (EGCC) - Dublin (EIDW)
Manchester (EGCC) - Amsterdam (EHAM)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Dublin (EIDW)
Amsterdam (EHAM) - Manchester (EGCC)

Event traffic will most likely be sharing the same airways, so expect it to be very busy!
subtitle: Triangle event between EIDW, EGCC and EHAM
title: The Trio

airports: Dublin (EIDW), Amsterdam Airport Schiphol (EHAM) and Paris Ch. de Gaulle (LFPG)
description:
On Saturday, 9th of July, VATéir, in conjunction with VATFRANCE and the Dutch VACC will be hosting the Dublin EuroShuttle. This event will give pilots an opportunity to fly into and out of some of Europe's busiest airports. Pilots will have the chance to fly between Dublin (EIDW) and Amsterdam Airport Schiphol (EHAM), or Dublin and Paris Ch. de Gaulle (LFPG), all whilst packing Europe's northern airways to capacity.

Every pilot that flies into Dublin from Schiphol or Paris will be entered into a draw to win a copy of Aerosoft's Mega Airport Dublin. The event runs from 17:30 till 20:30 UTC. For Amsterdam charts, check here. Routes can be found in VATROUTE. Don't miss out, join us for the Dublin EuroShuttle on July 9th, and lets fill Europe's skies!
subtitle: Fly between EIDW, EHAM, LFPG
title: Dublin EuroShuttle

description: Join us for an S2 practical examination on Dublin Tower on the 9th March 2016, commencing at 2000 GMT. Radar coverage will be provided for the event - come and see what the student's made of!
subtitle: Join us for a practical Tower examination on Dublin Tower
title: S2 Exam - Dublin Tower

description: Join us this Wednesday the 16th March for an S2 examination on Dublin (EIDW) Tower.
subtitle: Join us for a Tower examination in Dublin on Wednesday 16th March at 2000GMT!
title: S2 Exam - Dublin Tower
